aboutme_text: Professional in Systems Engineering with solid knowledge in software development, programming, database administration, cloud computing, and agile methodologies. Experienced in computer maintenance and in academic and independent projects involving languages such as Python, JavaScript, and PHP, as well as CMS tools like Wordpress. I stand out for my ability to learn autonomously, analytical thinking, and results-oriented approach, as well as for my teamwork and problem-solving skills.
projects_text: I have developed several projects that test my creativity and problem-solving skills, as well as my instinctive approach to modularization. I share with you a description and direct links to my repository on
